mapper.sql: ta.P_PositionID as id, ta.P_Position as positionId, ta.P_GroupID as groupId, ta.P_Number as positionNumber, ta.P_CName as positionName, ta.P_Summary as summary, ta.P_Popedoma as popedoma, ta.P_Qualification as qualification, ta.P_Remark as remark, ta.P_UpPosition as downPosition, ta.P_DownPosition as upPosition, ta.P_Count as count, ta.P_Delete as deleteFlag
